    • Method Detail

      • decorateConf

        private void decorateConf()
        Modify the connection's config so that operations run on the Replication Table have longer and a larger number of retries

      • setUpExecutor

        private Executor setUpExecutor()
        Sets up the thread pool executor used to build the Replication Table in the background
        Returns:
        the configured executor

      • getInitializationStatus

        public boolean getInitializationStatus()
        Get whether the Replication Table has been successfully initialized yet
        Returns:
        whether the Replication Table is initialized

      • setReplicationTableTimeOuts

        private Table setReplicationTableTimeOuts(Table replicationTable)
        Increases the RPC and operations timeouts for the Replication Table

      • buildQueueRowKey

        protected String buildQueueRowKey(String serverName,
                                  String queueId)
        Build the row key for the given queueId. This will uniquely identify it from all other queues in the cluster.
        Parameters:
        serverName - The owner of the queue
        queueId - String identifier of the queue
        Returns:
        String representation of the queue's row key

      • getRawQueueIdFromRowKey

        protected String getRawQueueIdFromRowKey(String rowKey)
        Parse the original queueId from a row key
        Parameters:
        rowKey - String representation of a queue's row key
        Returns:
        the original queueId

      • queueIdToRowKey

        protected byte[] queueIdToRowKey(String serverName,
                                 String queueId)
        Returns a queue's row key given either its raw or reclaimed queueId
        Parameters:
        queueId - queueId of the queue
        Returns:
        byte representation of the queue's row key

      • buildClaimedQueueHistory

        protected String buildClaimedQueueHistory(String originalHistory,
                                          String oldServer)
        Creates a "|" delimited record of the queue's past region server owners.
        Parameters:
        originalHistory - the queue's original owner history
        oldServer - the name of the server that used to own the queue
        Returns:
        the queue's new owner history

      • getListOfReplicators

        protected List<String> getListOfReplicators()
        Get a list of all region servers that have outstanding replication queues. These servers could be alive, dead or from a previous run of the cluster.
        Returns:
        a list of server names

      • getAllQueues

        protected List<String> getAllQueues(String serverName)

      • readWALsFromResult

        protected List<String> readWALsFromResult(Result queue)
        Read all of the WAL's from a queue into a list
        Parameters:
        queue - HBase query result containing the queue
        Returns:
        a list of all the WAL filenames

      • getQueuesBelongingToServer

        protected ResultScanner getQueuesBelongingToServer(String server)
                                            throws IOException
        Get the queue id's and meta data (Owner and History) for the queues belonging to the named server
        Parameters:
        server - name of the server
        Returns:
        a ResultScanner over the QueueIds belonging to the server
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getOrBlockOnReplicationTable

        protected Table getOrBlockOnReplicationTable()
                                      throws IOException
        Attempts to acquire the Replication Table. This operation will block until it is assigned by the CreateReplicationWorker thread. It is up to the caller of this method to close the returned Table
        Returns:
        the Replication Table when it is created
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getAndSetUpReplicationTable

        private Table getAndSetUpReplicationTable()
                                   throws IOException
        Creates a new copy of the Replication Table and sets up the proper Table time outs for it
        Returns:
        the Replication Table
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createReplicationTableInBackground

        private void createReplicationTableInBackground()
                                         throws IOException
        Builds the Replication Table in a background thread. Any method accessing the Replication Table should do so through getOrBlockOnReplicationTable()
        Throws:
        IOException - if the Replication Table takes too long to build
